title: Tarar grieved over death of father of PIO Mubashir Hassan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 20 (APP): Federal Minister for Information, Broadcasting, National Heritage and Culture Ataullah Tarar on Saturday expressed deep grief and sorrow over death of the father of Principal Information Officer (PIO) Mubashir Hassan.
In a condolence message, the minister expressed his heartfelt condolences and sympathy to Mubashir Hassan and his family.
He said he was deeply saddened to hear the news of the death of PIO Mubashir Hassan’s father.
Terming the death of a father a great tragedy for the children, he said the “vacuum created by the death of the father will never be filled”.
The minister said at this hour of sorrow, he shared the grief of the bereaved family.
He prayed to Allah Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear this loss with fortitude.
